text: ni:Sanka tamaro palanahara allaha ja che, jene akaso ane dharatinum sarjana cha divasamam karyu, pachi arsa para birajamana thayo, te dareka karyani vyavastha kare che, teni paravanagi vagara ko'i teni pase bhalamana karanara nathi, avo allaha tamaro palanahara che. To tame teni bandagi karo, sum to pana tame sikhamana prapta nathi karata
